text: Hey Noel, I hadnt used memberships when i built sites back in the day. I will circle up with some folks internally though to see what I can find out.

We currently dont have a way for you to resend the registration email via a workflow. I will make sure to pass this request onto the team internally though. Can you also post this to the <http://ideas.HubSpot.com|ideas.HubSpot.com> forum so others can also upvote this idea? Feel free to post this idea back to our <#C26E7JT8V|ideas> channel for exposure as well.
Thanks <@U2H3TT8F2>. I added the idea in the community. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Send-Membership-registration-email-via-workflow/idi-p/440036#M83589>
